attributes.action: Introduce stricter control or total elimination of the chemical Dihydrogen Monoxide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This chemical is too easily available, and has, among others, the following effects:

it can cause excessive sweating and vomiting
it is a major component in acid rain
it can cause severe burns in its gaseous state
accidental inhalation can kill you
it contributes to erosion
it decreases effectiveness of automobile brakes
it has been found in tumors of terminal cancer patients

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
